name: Highway Racing 3D: Arcade
description:
GET TOUCH in 2020:

Drive your ARCADE sports racing car on an endless neon highway through the ambiance of the 80s
Put the pedal to the metal, racer! Your fuel is getting down.
Keep moving on the endless highway, move faster! Reach top speed on the road. Go to the deep atmosphere of the synth music flow. Escape from the traffic on the road, get more fuels and reach a better distance. Are you have good driving skills? The endless highway is a challenge for your, racer. Just drive volume up and keep your speed grow. The 80s ambiance is here.
Ready to endless run? Ready to deep neon glowing? Play Free Ride! The endless highway is waiting for you.

FEATURES:
* Physics-based movement sports arcade car.
* We tried to do our best high-quality 3D graphics. Tired of outdated graphics? We made a high level of visual and effects on mobile platforms.
* New adaptive graphics system for low-performance devices. We realize that fps in the action game is most important. Highway Racer now listens to your device performance and correct the graphics for more response and smoothness. Yes, at Runtime!
* Polygon and low-poly retro 3D style.
* Smooth retrowave arcade 3D design.
* Highscore system. Challenge yourself. This game has a high score system. Your best result in a day will be saved. Just keep playing and reach more results.
* Great synthwave soundtrack.
* Easy touchscreen controls.
* More than 11 thousand Android devices support for this game.

HOW TO PLAY for FREE:
* Drive on, collect more coins, buy more fuel, avoid the traffic and try to get a better distance.
* Tap or Hold the left side of the screen to steer left
* Tap or Hold the right side of the screen to steer right
* Tap or Hold the center of the screen to use the brakes

MORE:
Leave your comments and ratings. What this game may be better? Let us know.
Music by Chromocean, Alexandr Zhelanov, and Bogart VGM.
3D model reference: Liriaicha and TSB3DMODELS.
